languages.text: "Оба они — мутанты, и тем самым нарушили закон Его, однако в презренном простолюдине нашлось место благородству — как тут неволей не испытать крупицу уважения? Хоть этот еретик и низкого рода, но он не попирает ценностей Тассеры, как дворянин, а почитает наши традиции и Его волю. Рожденный быть чернью, он приложил все свои силы и способности, отринул запреты и смел каждого на своем пути — и все ради того, чтобы выбрать себе новую судьбу".

"They are both mutants, and have thereby violated His law. Yet, when one finds a spark of nobility in an abject commoner, one cannot help but feel a grain of respect for them. This heretic may be of low birth, but he does not flout the values of Thassera the way the nobleman does, and thus honours our traditions and His will. Born into the rabble, he applied all his abilities and skills, defied the restraints placed upon him, and crushed those who stood in his path — all in order to forge a new destiny for himself."
languages.original_text: "Оба они — мутанты, и тем самым нарушили закон Его, однако в презренном простолюдине нашлось место благородству — как тут неволей не испытать крупицу уважения? Хоть этот еретик и низкого рода, но он не попирает ценностей Тассеры, как дворянин, а почитает наши традиции и Его волю. Рожденный быть чернью, он приложил все свои силы и способности, отринул запреты и смел каждого на своем пути — и все ради того, чтобы выбрать себе новую судьбу".

traits.locale_text: "They are both mutants, and have thereby violated His law. Yet, when one finds a spark of nobility in an abject commoner, one cannot help but feel a grain of respect for them. This heretic may be of low birth, but he does not flout the values of Thassera the way the nobleman does, and thus honours our traditions and His will. Born into the rabble, he applied all his abilities and skills, defied the restraints placed upon him, and crushed those who stood in his path — all in order to forge a new destiny for himself."

"They are both mutants, and thereby violated His law, yet when you find a spark of nobility in a despicable worm, one cannot help but feel a grain of respect. This heretic may be of common birth, but he does not flout the values of Thassera the way the nobleman does, and so abides by the dogma of our traditions and His will. With all his abilities and skill, defying barriers and restraints, he broke the shackles of his destiny to forge a new path for himself."

"They are both mutants, and have thereby violated His law. Yet, when one finds a spark of nobility in an abject commoner, one cannot help but feel a grain of respect for them. languages.text: “他们两个人都是变种人，也因此违背了帝皇的律法。但即便如此，当卑微的平民身上迸发出一丝高贵的火光时，也会让人情不自禁地产生一丝敬意。尽管这个异端分子出身低贱，但他并不像那个贵族一样鄙夷塔瑟拉的价值观。他尊重我们的传统教条与帝皇的意志。虽然他生为平民，但他依靠自己的能力与技巧，努力挣脱身上的种种限制。他消灭了挡在路上的所有障碍，他做的一切都是为了塑造新的命运。”
languages.original_text: "They are both mutants, and have thereby violated His law. Yet, when one finds a spark of nobility in an abject commoner, one cannot help but feel a grain of respect for them. This heretic may be of low birth, but he does not flout the values of Thassera the way the nobleman does, and thus honours our traditions and His will. Born into the rabble, he applied all his abilities and skills, defied the restraints placed upon him, and crushed those who stood in his path — all in order to forge a new destiny for himself."

traits.locale_text: “他们两个人都是变种人，也因此违背了帝皇的律法。但即便如此，当卑微的平民身上迸发出一丝高贵的火光时，也会让人情不自禁地产生一丝敬意。尽管这个异端分子出身低贱，但他并不像那个贵族一样鄙夷塔瑟拉的价值观。他尊重我们的传统教条与帝皇的意志。虽然他生为平民，但他依靠自己的能力与技巧，努力挣脱身上的种种限制。他消灭了挡在路上的所有障碍，他做的一切都是为了塑造新的命运。”

languages.text: «Los dos son mutantes, y por tanto culpables de quebrantar Su ley. Pero cuando uno encuentra una chispa de nobleza en un plebeyo abyecto, no puede evitar sentir un ápice de respeto por él. Puede que este hereje sea de baja cuna, pero no desprecia los valores de Thassera del mismo modo que el noble, y por tanto honra nuestras tradiciones y Su voluntad. Pese a su vulgaridad, ha aplicado todas sus capacidades y habilidades, ha desafiado las barreras y ataduras que lo retenían, ha aplastado a cuantos se interpusieron en su camino... y con ello se ha labrado un nuevo destino».
languages.original_text: "They are both mutants, and have thereby violated His law. Yet, when one finds a spark of nobility in an abject commoner, one cannot help but feel a grain of respect for them. This heretic may be of low birth, but he does not flout the values of Thassera the way the nobleman does, and thus honours our traditions and His will. Born into the rabble, he applied all his abilities and skills, defied the restraints placed upon him, and crushed those who stood in his path — all in order to forge a new destiny for himself."

Pero cuando uno encuentra una chispa de nobleza en un plebeyo abyecto, no puede evitar sentir un ápice de respeto por él. Puede que este hereje sea de baja cuna, pero no desprecia los valores de Thassera del mismo modo que el noble, y por tanto honra nuestras tradiciones y Su voluntad. Pese a su vulgaridad, ha aplicado todas sus capacidades y habilidades, ha desafiado las barreras y ataduras que lo retenían, ha aplastado a cuantos se interpusieron en su camino... y con ello se ha labrado un nuevo destino».

languages.text: "İkisi de mutant. O'nun kanunlarını ihlal ettiler. Yine de aşağılık avamda bir asalet kıvılcımı gördüğümüzde onlara karşı bir nebze olsun saygı duymamazlık edemeyiz. Bu kâfir, düşük seviyeli biri olarak doğmuş olabilir ama soylunun yaptığı gibi Thassera'nın değerlerini hiçe saymıyor. Aksine geleneklerimizi ve O'nun iradesini onurlandırıyor. Ayaktakımı içinde doğmuş, tüm kabiliyet ve becerilerini kullanmış, mecbur bırakıldığı kısıtlamalara meydan okumuş ve yoluna çıkanları ezmiş... Hepsini de kendine yeni bir kader çizmek için yapmış."
languages.original_text: "They are both mutants, and have thereby violated His law. Yet, when one finds a spark of nobility in an abject commoner, one cannot help but feel a grain of respect for them. This heretic may be of low birth, but he does not flout the values of Thassera the way the nobleman does, and thus honours our traditions and His will. Born into the rabble, he applied all his abilities and skills, defied the restraints placed upon him, and crushed those who stood in his path — all in order to forge a new destiny for himself."

traits.locale_text: "İkisi de mutant. O'nun yasalarını ihlal ettiler. Yine de aşağılık avamda bir asalet kıvılcımı gördüğümüzde onlara karşı bir nebze olsun saygı duymamazlık edemeyiz. Bu kâfir, düşük seviyeli biri olarak doğmuş olabilir ama soylunun yaptığı gibi Thassera'nın değerlerini hiçe saymıyor. Aksine geleneklerimizi ve O'nun iradesini onurlandırıyor. Ayaktakımı içinde doğmuş, tüm kabiliyet ve becerilerini kullanmış, mecbur bırakıldığı kısıtlamalara meydan okumuş ve yoluna çıkanları ezmiş... Hepsini de kendine yeni bir kader çizmek için yapmış."

languages.text: 「彼らはともに変異体であり、それによって陛下の法を犯しています。ですが、哀れな庶民の中に高貴さの火花を見ると、どうしても一抹の敬意を抱かずにはいられません。この異端者は卑しい生まれかもしれませんが、その行動は貴族のようにタッセーラの価値観を踏みにじってはおらず、私たちの伝統と陛下の御心に従っているのです。すべて自らの新たな運命を切り開くために、彼は下層の出でありながら、持てる才覚と技術を尽くし、自らに課された制約を打ち破り、行く手を阻む者たちを打ち倒しました」
languages.original_text: "They are both mutants, and have thereby violated His law. Yet, when one finds a spark of nobility in an abject commoner, one cannot help but feel a grain of respect for them. This heretic may be of low birth, but he does not flout the values of Thassera the way the nobleman does, and thus honours our traditions and His will. Born into the rabble, he applied all his abilities and skills, defied the restraints placed upon him, and crushed those who stood in his path — all in order to forge a new destiny for himself."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らはともに変異体であり、それによって陛下の法を犯しています。ですが、哀れな庶民の中に高貴さの火花を見ると、どうしても一抹の敬意を抱かずにはいられません。この異端者は卑しい生まれかもしれませんが、その行動は貴族のようにタッセーラの価値観を踏みにじってはおらず、私たちの伝統と陛下の御心に従っているのです。すべて自らの新たな運命を切り開くために、彼は下層の出でありながら、持てる才覚と技術を尽くし、自らに課された制約を打ち破り、行く手を阻む者たちを打ち倒しました」

languages.text: « Tous deux sont des mutants, et en tant que tels, leur seule existence est contraire à Sa loi. Pour autant, lorsqu'on décèle une étincelle de noblesse chez un abject roturier, on ne peut s'empêcher de ressentir à son égard un semblant de respect, si minime soit-il. Si cet hérétique est de basse extraction, lui au moins ne bafoue pas les valeurs de Thassera comme le fait son noble coaccusé, il honore nos traditions et Sa volonté. Né parmi la plèbe, il a su appliquer tous ses talents, défier les contraintes qu'on lui a imposées et écraser quiconque a tenté de s'opposer à lui... Et tout ça, dans l'unique but de se forger un nouveau destin. »
languages.original_text: "They are both mutants, and have thereby violated His law. Yet, when one finds a spark of nobility in an abject commoner, one cannot help but feel a grain of respect for them. This heretic may be of low birth, but he does not flout the values of Thassera the way the nobleman does, and thus honours our traditions and His will. Born into the rabble, he applied all his abilities and skills, defied the restraints placed upon him, and crushed those who stood in his path — all in order to forge a new destiny for himself."

Pour autant, lorsqu'on décèle une étincelle de noblesse chez un abject roturier, on ne peut s'empêcher de ressentir à son égard un semblant de respect, si minime soit-il. Si cet hérétique est de basse extraction, lui au moins ne bafoue pas les valeurs de Thassera comme le fait son noble coaccusé, il honore nos traditions et Sa volonté. Né parmi la plèbe, il a su appliquer tous ses talents, défier les contraintes qu'on lui a imposées et écraser quiconque a tenté de s'opposer à lui... Et tout ça, dans l'unique but de se forger un nouveau destin. »

languages.text: "Sie sind beide Mutanten und haben damit gegen das Gesetz verstoßen. Aber wenn man in einem gewöhnlichen Bürger einen Funken Anstand entdeckt, empfindet man doch ein kleines Körnchen Respekt für ihn. Dieser Ketzer mag von niederer Geburt sein, doch er verspottet die Werte von Thassera nicht wie der Adelige. Im Schmutz geboren, setzte er alle seine Fähigkeiten und Fertigkeiten ein und trotzte den Einschränkungen, die ihm auferlegt wurden. Er vernichtete alle, die ihm im Weg standen – und das alles, um ein neues Schicksal für sich zu schmieden."
languages.original_text: "They are both mutants, and have thereby violated His law. Yet, when one finds a spark of nobility in an abject commoner, one cannot help but feel a grain of respect for them. This heretic may be of low birth, but he does not flout the values of Thassera the way the nobleman does, and thus honours our traditions and His will. Born into the rabble, he applied all his abilities and skills, defied the restraints placed upon him, and crushed those who stood in his path — all in order to forge a new destiny for himself."
